attributes.review: I was so excited to download this app bc someone told me that if if you do Gabbie Hanna will arrive at your house promptly but after 3 weeks of waiting I knew that the app was a complete scam!!!! Everything is about politics and the 2020 election and doesn’t even mention Gabbie!!! As an avid TikToker and fan of Gabbie I am extremely upset that I was ripped off😣🙃❤️🧚✨🐵💫🌼💫
attributes.title: Absolute trash

attributes.review: i got this app because i’m very 🧚🏻‍♀️ interested 🧚🏻‍♀️ in the 🦋orange 🦋 figure we call our✨ President✨ and was very disappointed 😢 he promised that if i was to download this app that matthew grey gulber was to show up to my house with a pool ✨✨ and i’ve very disappointed to announce that that never happened i’m very disappointed with orange trump😭 opps i meant Donald Trump my mistake✨🌟
attributes.title: ✨horrible✨

attributes.review: I was just curious to see what all the hype was, but as soon as I opened the app it malfunctioned and closed itself. Then I started getting emails and texts I never consented to and random phone calls. After having this app on my phone for only 1 day, the 5 G has seeped into my blood stream causing me to become a raging intersectional feminist, pro choice, BLM liberal!
attributes.title: 5 G

attributes.review:
The app is horrible it always lags and lags.
It is extremely annoying. And right when I opens the app it crashed my whole phone I had to get it fixed cause my phone would not stop turning black and white (also I can get seizure from flashing colors) so I was extremely scared. Do not recommend.🤦🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: BAD!!!

attributes.review: I was making my way to get this app to see what trump has to say and what his plans were but when I went into this app it almost crashed my phone my phone was lagging so hard it almost broke. I think this app is allergic to our phones cause it keeps glitching witch is not good for personal reasons.
attributes.title: Glitches

attributes.review: This app gave my grandpa a heart attack and killed him he is in the graves resting like a baby . The things this Cheeto put on this app make me want to flush my brain out it was absolutely horrid and now my child is crying because of the awful things we’ve seen on this app so now that I have given up the app my life has been terrible 😢😢.
attributes.title: Do Do

attributes.review:
I've been hearing things about this app for quite some time, and I didn't believe it until I downloaded the app. As soon as I looked at it, I quickly deleted it. 
The app is also too slow and takes hours. I don't know if that just my phone, but still...this app for me, no thanks.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to see how the orange🍊 would change the country. But it turns out he gets his panties in a wad because gen z ruined his rallys😞. Like how dare they. So as a repercussion he wants to ban the only app that bring serotonin to all the teenagers in America during the election year. also the logo for the app is cute✨. so i wouldn't recommend this app.
attributes.title: not a fan✨

attributes.review: Upon downloading “Official Trump 2020 App” I became infested with crabs!! I knew Trump would pull something like this! When the symptoms first appeared, I contacted the Trump Administration and they told me that if I don’t get tested, then I don’t have it, so it’s ok. Then I remember that they’re all imbeciles, so I got tested and what do you know- I have crabs!! Don’t download this app unless you want crabs!
attributes.title: Gave me crabs!! 🤮🤮

attributes.review: got this app to see what trump was all out and i was super disappointed. VERY BIASED AND RACIST😔would give 0 stars if i could. definitely would not feel bad if this app got taken off the app store. trump if you’re seeing this, all i wanna say is how about you start focusing on IMPORTANT things happening around the country instead of trying to ban tiktok✨
attributes.title: VERY HORRIBLE DO NOT RECOMMEND
